title: Data Analytics for Immersive Environments
text:
Welcome
This Quarto website displays the first part of my individual project for Data Analytics for Immersive Environments
It Includes:

Part A: SQL Queries and Database Exploration
Part B: Linear Regression Analysis and Visualisation
Part C: Technology Exploration of new R Packages

Each section can be accessed through the navigation bar at the top of the page


 SQL 


 Linear Regression 


 Technology Exploration

Discussion
The regression model suggests that both budget and crew size have a positive association with production success. Success Rates are influenced by the use of larger team units and higher budgets. The p-values indicate which predictors are significant.
